headline.main: The War on TV, Here and Over There

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''British Take Blunter Approach to War Reporting'' (Critic's Notebook, Nov. 9): Caryn James doesn't mention certain important differences between the journalism practiced by British TV correspondents and their American counterparts.
abstract: Simon Marks letter on Caryn James's Nov 9 article on British Afghanistan war reporting notes British television reporters are allowed level of editorializing not permitted on American networks; drawing
